name: Jessica Mysterious Journey
description:
Embark on a brain-bending, mysterious journey with Jessica, an adventurer and riddle-solving lover. During vacation part of an ancient map comes into her hands. Intrigued by an old legend and the hidden treasure, Jessica fearlessly sets out for adventure.

Find rare items, missing pieces of the map and solve a secret code in level after level of stunning hidden object challenges. Search intricately detailed scenes for hidden objects, solve perplexing puzzles, and discover a lost treasure tucked away in a secret location.

Featuring innovative hidden object gameplay and an intriguing storyline, Jessica. Mysterious journey is a thrilling escape for the whole family.


- Original storyline with unique mysterious twists
- Unique Hidden Object Gameplay
- Several game modes with 3 levels each
- A large number of engaging mini-games
- Beautiful characters
- Gorgeous Full-Screen Graphics and Comics
- Stunning Scenes to Search
- Loads of Brain-Bending Fun
